html:
4.18.19  3:24 am   please explain the lyrics of "how am i spost" as in depth as you possibly can

     ok

4.18.19  12:44 am   What voice part are you?

     for my own work i have to do all of them

4.18.19  12:19 am   Are you inspired by Billy Joel or not?

     sometimes

4.17.19  11:54 pm   What is your opinion on pockets

     see if they are reversible, that could be fun

4.17.19  11:34 pm   are you worried you'll go through a phase were you will try a bunch of weird pills for productivity?

     no

4.17.19  11:12 pm   Do you actually have content saved up, or do you say that to protect yourself from the crushing reality that your career is something you can never finish?

     of course i can never finish it. there is infinite content left to make, in addition to a huge amount of content i have partially made, which would also take infinite time to finish

4.17.19  10:25 pm   What's the difference between add2 and add9?

     nothing really

4.17.19  9:15 pm   Why do I always forget everything 

     to distract you from the innumerable things you do remember

4.17.19  8:09 pm   is the name of your next song user

     no

4.17.19  7:13 pm   What is your favorite meme

     pepin the short

4.17.19  6:55 pm   i think i'm going to write a book and fill it with everything i like. i don't care if people buy it, i just think it's time to be happy instead of sad. thoughts?

     i recommend writing a second book also

4.17.19  5:13 pm   how many "ha"s and how many "ah"s and how many "hah"s are in hahahahahahahahahahahahahahah?

     oh my it looks like you have just discovered quantum physics

4.17.19  5:09 pm   How can I grow a beard?

     you must plant many beard seeds

4.17.19  4:20 pm   9.17.17 1:01 pm What did this old shade of purple look like?

     6.21.16  4:08 pm

4.17.19  4:00 pm   where do you usually begin when you make a song? bass? melody? chords? drums? or does it vary?

     first i must adjust the shades to approx 70.71%

4.17.19  3:03 pm   are ya dropping a bop soon

     could be a pob

4.17.19  2:26 pm   how do i play kickball, other than kicking the ball

     stop other people from kicking it?

4.17.19  1:28 pm   How can I get faster

     at what

4.17.19  1:14 pm   do you like golf

     wish it had more balls

4.17.19  12:51 pm   honestly i really don't think you should remove songs and videos from your website, i understand that you think some of them suck but i think that one of the things i liked about the website was that it had almost everything you had ever done, and removing things kind of ruins that, especially because not everything you removed was bad imo

     on a day to day basis, i add far more to this site than i remove

4.17.19  12:35 pm   Do you or did you do percussion?

     it's one of the most important assets to my songs and videos

4.17.19  12:20 pm   What year is it?

     i have it written down somewhere

4.17.19  12:14 pm   why do people have multiple names for one note? why not just call it one thing

      you're lucky there's even a finite number of notes. a magic trick a few hundred years ago zipped that up. the double named notes are actually a relic of a sadder, more helpless reality, where the keys cirlcle flung out into oblivion on both sides and didn't connect, yet came so painfully close

4.17.19  12:03 pm   i found an effective way to come up with a tune. just record yourself banging on your keyboard and play random notes. listen to it as many times as you want and see if you can hear something tuneworthy

     easier to just put a stapler holding down 1 note for 24 hours and record that

4.17.19  11:27 am   have you thought of getting a manager? that way you don't have to get people to do things, they can do it for you

     how do you get them to do that

4.17.19  10:59 am   Whats your opinion of fish with legs?

     don't know of any

4.17.19  9:42 am   Thoughts on The African Slave Trade

     would not recommended

4.17.19  6:51 am   Am rubber band

     #relatable

4.17.19  3:03 am   which questions should i avoid asking on here

     which questions should i avoid answering

4.17.19  2:17 am   how do i know music is real

     if you can hear it then it's real

4.17.19  12:31 am   I CANT SLEEP IM TOO EXCITED 

     sounds like a good time to come up with solutions to all the world's problems (and write them down of course)

4.17.19  12:23 am   Would you call yourself art or what you do art?

     it is 100% science and business

4.17.19  12:08 am   i infuse a lot of uncertainty into my speaking/writing. "maybe", "it seems", "probably", "could be", ect. on one hand i think i am just trying to accurately convey reality. on the other hand, most professions frown on this

     as long as you are confident in your uncertainties, that's where you can get the big smiles. professional and non

4.16.19  11:56 pm   how long have you been doing daily updates to the notebook?
(clarification for the folks at home: updates of already made, past entries. meaning they are only being posted daily, not created daily. anyway like and subscribe)

     sometime this january i went on a binge of finding things to post, and i figured what's the point of dumping it all at once when people are still going to ask why i 'never update it' the next day, so i paced them out over several months so as to guarantee new readable content for you every single day. might even change the name of the site to "active dot com"

4.16.19  10:37 pm   How do I get some people in my theatre to memorize their lines???? The play is in two weeks come onnn

     i actually don't know how to get anyone to do anything

4.16.19  10:28 pm   Would you like to be a voice actor for a video game? 

     can you tell me some more details

4.16.19  9:36 pm   I have a performance coming up, and I need help on how to show emotion while doing it, got any tips?

     there are no tips until you've done some shows before. it's impossible to learn anything until you've already been on the stage

4.16.19  8:20 pm   what's your opinion on the importance of knowing your scales on the piano?

     if you get into a more personal relationship with the notes, the entire kingdom could be yours and you will not need to wait in any lines

4.16.19  7:53 pm   I have to do something that I don't want to do. Any advice?

     find out why you have to do it

4.16.19  7:42 pm   Wait if randomness is boring, then why is there the "i'm feeling randy" button?

     the randomness is being applied to genuine content. if you were to view the randomness itself, it would look like a series of numbers, chosen randomly

4.16.19  7:22 pm   Have you ever thought about making your own band?

     yes

     If yes, what would be its name?

     i can't tell you

4.16.19  7:19 pm   How do you come up with the notes and beat to your song?

     it's just the same way you would draw up a road map of your favorite town

4.16.19  6:37 pm   is there any weak side of the traditional grip?

     only if you don't like it

4.16.19  6:35 pm   have you ever listened to microtonal instruments (oud, bağlama, tanbur, ney etc.)? what dou you think about them? would you ever use microtones in your music?

     i will use tones of any size, as long as it registers boat floatingly high on the float-boat index

4.16.19  5:34 pm   I feel like nothing but my diagnoses. Anything that feels like it's a part of my personality, is just a symptom. I feel like I am nothing but my problems. How do I feel like a person again?

     see if you can diagnose someone else with something. diagnosis is a very personly thing to do

4.16.19  4:48 pm   4.16.19  1:04 am

Loop machines maybe?

     not interested in loops. my middle name is notloop, that's just a coincidence but you get the idea

4.16.19  1:40 pm   How can I confess my feelings to a friend?

     ask them how you should do it to another friend

4.16.19  1:28 pm   why do "i'm sad" and "i wanna go home" have almost the exact same instrumental?

     because they were test exercises done on the same day for exactly the same reason

4.16.19  1:14 pm   is your next song "sure"

     no

4.16.19  12:38 pm   thoughts on thought itself?

     it's like another world, in your mind!
